thread.section_title: Malayalam - Entertainment - The Times of India
thread.title: Mammootty to leave to Japan in October
thread.title_full: Mammootty to leave to Japan in October - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Mammootty to leave to Japan in October
text:
Mammootty is on tour. The actor, who will return from his Bahrain next week, will shoot for AK Sajan film's for a day and in a week will fly out to Japan.
A source close to the actor says, "He'll be leaving for a short, personal trip to Japan and will be back by the end of October." Mammootty had taken a break from filming and headed to Span in July this year with his family for a vacation.
Incidentally, the actor will head out to London in November for filming White, which will see him team up with Gangs of Wasseypur actress Huma Qureshi.
